nodes.text: Orrk was Guildmaster of the Metalsmiths Guild of Vandelhelm during the Galactic Civil War.

Orrk conspired with Imperial Admiral Mordur to kill two siblings, both members of the royal house of Vandelhelm, who being excorted to Vandelhelm by Han Solo. Orrk was eventually killed by Solo in a fierce fistfight-cum-duel.
